casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

December 10, 2013

[Cite as 12/10/2013 Case Announcements, 2013-Ohio-5404.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2013-1822. State ex rel. Swanson v. Stark Cty. Democratic Cent. Commt.

In Mandamus. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of mandamus.

Upon consideration of relators’ motion for ancillary injunctive relief, it is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
